name: SF 3312
text: Located right next to La Fayette Creamery. Our first time trying their pizza. We ordered a $10.99 pizza with 2 toppings of olives and bell peppers. We had our crust flavored with butter, oregano and onion. The crust is where the flavor is. â€¦More

name: Syed Fawaz
text: We were visiting Lafayette Creamery next door and so decided on picking up the pizza cor dinner from HH. The pizza was decent and fairly priced. But not one of the best we have tried. We definitely want to go back and try other options. Especially thier deep dish offering.

name: Region Rat
text: Great food at great prices!! A must stop any time Iâ€™m near one. Hardest part is choosing what to eat as the options are a plenty.

name: Jacqualine Borden
text: Tonight as well as the last time, I was not impressed. Both times they really messed up the order ðŸ˜”ðŸ˜” this time Leaving out a whole pizza, that was for the children!! I Love Hungry Howies!!! Please get it together!!!

name: lisa cavender
text: The employees and manager here at this Hungry Howies are the friendliest youâ€™ll ever find. Itâ€™s always neat and clean and they go out of their way to make you happy. I highly recommend this Hungry Howies

name: Live Love Life
text: Good service. They were very busy, but got the order ready in a decent amount of time considering it being a Friday night. They delivered the pizza right to the car web order to curb side.

name: SV Downwards
text: I've been getting pizza from this store for over a year and I have never had such horrible service. Our pizza was delivered without anyone ringing the door bell or knocking. The pop I ordered was placed in front of my door and I had to â€¦More

name: Edward Payne
text: Love hungry howie's and we have missed it while we have not been in Michigan. It's only getting a 2 star because of the food. The staff working and obviously the management is lacking. When covid 19 numbers are going back up in Michigan â€¦More

name: Jim Cunningham
text: Not enough items on the pizza,it's too bad because the flavor of the pizza is real good

name: Stephen McMillan
text: Our goto hungry Howie's... staff is great.

name: Nikolas Stoltzner
text: Always good food but the flavored crust is whats amazing

name: Krystal Kerr
text: Excellent customer service, cleanliness, and accurate orders!

name: John Boettcher
text: Pretty good pizza at pretty good prices.  Not the best, but by far, not the worst.  If you like flavored crust, this is your pizza place, and it's from Michigan!!

name: Moto Medicated
text: They make their pizzas with love. You can tell they use their heart and soul every time you have a slice

name: Christopher R. Keeler, M.A.
text: Slowest service I've ever experienced with a Hungry Howie's and the Managers would even bother to speak with customers in the phone.  Said I was Order no. 175 and they were well past that on in the 190s, yet it's still take at least a HALF â€¦More

name: Michael Dean
text: Friendly staff and always fast with getting your order

name: Billy B
text: Delivery took twice as long as promised and pizza shows up lukewarm with wrong flavored crust.

name: Anti Venom
text: This is the best Hungry Howies in our area by far. My office is in Texas Corners so we order quite often and they always exceed our expectations.

name: Caden Burns
text: Great food, better employees

name: Carl Bishop
text: Would give it negative stars for the attitude of one of the managers if I could. The other manager was rly nice tho so I guess they deserve a star for that.

name: roy stanfill
text: Good food but a little bit too buttery for a sandwich

name: John B
text: Great $5 lunch deals

name: S
text: Delivery took over two hours and when I called, all they did was tell me it was on its way and gave me an incredibly sarcastic and insincere apology

name: Casey Ranger
text: I placed my online order and the time said 60 minutes to make, but they came in 40. Pizza was perfect, hot, and the crust was perfectly flavored. Their three cheese bread was so delicious. And the driver was efficient and friendly. I also â€¦More

name: Dean France2
text: Excellent food and service

name: Phil Bullock
text: Ordered a pizza last week. Got it, took it home and found it to be a different pizza from what we ordered and to top it off, it was completely burnt on the bottom (more black crust than golden brown). I called and asked to speak to the â€¦More

name: Xara D'Karn
text: The one and only single pizza place that delivers in this tiny little 4 way stop. Which is nice. They change management and employees quite often so the quality varies A LOT. I will say one thing. If they do mess up your pizza they are good â€¦More

name: Laurie Maxam
text: Last time I ate pizza there was nasty. I pulled a hair out of my mouth at least 12 inches long. Lost my stomach. They need to wear hair nets if they are serving food to customers. Second time this has happened.  Will not eat there again.

name: gabriel maldonado
text: bought two calzones. They forgot the pizza sauce.then when we left they forgot to put the pizza sauce in one of them anyways. Dont know whats going on here anymore. Used to be fast serivce and little to no errors with tasty food.

name: Euponine S
text: The manager told me she was too busy for me and ignored me in front of many other customers. Would not recommend, they have very bad customer service

name: Matt / Shawna B
text: Horrible customer service!!  Go give your business to a family owned business that appreciates your business and provides great customer service!! We cannot order online beacuse there system doesn't recognize our neighbohoods addresses so â€¦More

name: Candice Green
text: My order is always fast and hot and the workers are always exceptionally friendly.amf helpful

name: Bruce Tran
text: Dude hungry howies is the best place to go for pizza, they have a friendly enviorment and friendly staff, especially the General manager Jake dumont. The company uses to be a worse but now since hes been in charge he has boosted the store â€¦More

name: Aryana Verile
text: It says there location is on 8th street,  but I don't recall seeing one on that road.  Is this the one on Drake? Where is this one at?

name: John Preston
text: Like the butter crust pizza.

name: Matt Wykle
text: Not late night if closed at 10 pm on Thursday

name: Kellie Crislip
text: Best pizza ever!

name: Ken
text: Good service and great food.

name: Devon Long
text: I'm not impressed with this location! They forgot a piece of my order and it took me calling back 3 times talking to someone and an hour for someone to bring it to me in which I was late leaving for my son's event and he wasn't able to eat â€¦More

name: Yvonne Johnson
text: Always yummy, fast and friendly!!

name: Michelle Lockwood
text: Called and placed an order .an hour or so later we call back because we hadn't received the order.they said that the order was never made so we had to wait another 20 min.

name: Caleb Vanderploeg
text: 29 cent pizza
